title: WWE 2K14
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". FINALLY. 2K Sports' lineup of premier simulation titles expands with the company's first release in the flagship WWE videogame franchise, WWE 2K14. The most electrifying, authentic and comprehensive WWE video game experience to date has arrived. Become Immortal.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: 30 Years of WrestleMania Tee
childDownloads.description: Celebrate the 30 Years of WrestleMania single-player campaign in WWE 2K14 with the shirt made for WrestleMania 30 in New Orleans!

childDownloads.title: 30 Years of WrestleMania Tee
childDownloads.description: Celebrate the 30 Years of WrestleMania single-player campaign in WWE 2K14 with the shirt made for WrestleMania 30 in New Orleans!

childDownloads.title: Accelerator
childDownloads.description: If you own the WWE 2K14 Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. WWE 2K14 required; sold separately. Xbox LIVE free membership required. Decide the overall rankings and attributes levels of every WWE Superstar, Legend, and Diva in the game. Unlock every WWE Superstar, Legend, and Diva, including alternate attires and all arenas and championships in WWE 2K14. Note: This item is included in the Season Pass premium content purchase.

childDownloads.title: Damien Sandow Outfit
childDownloads.description: Become the intellectual savior of the masses!  Download Damien Sandow’s entrance gear today, complete with Egyptian cotton robe.  YOU’RE WELCOME!

childDownloads.title: Dolph Ziggler "Stealing the Show" Outfit
childDownloads.description: Steal the show with Dolph Ziggler’s gear and become the ultimate Show Off!

childDownloads.title: Fandango Outfit
childDownloads.description: The dancing Superstar will not be disrespected!  Put on Fandango’s gear and pronounce his name correctly.  It’s FAHN-DAHN-GO!

childDownloads.title: Hollywood Hogan Outift
childDownloads.description: Turn your Avatar into a part of the New World Order and download “Hollywood” Hulk Hogan’s gear.  And remember that when you’re with the nWo, you’re just tooo sweeeeet!

childDownloads.title: John Cena Outfit
childDownloads.description: The Champ is here!  Celebrate John Cena’s WWE Title reign with his authentic WWE entrance gear!

childDownloads.title: Kane Mask
childDownloads.description: The Devil’s Favorite Demon has arrived!  Wear the sinister mask of the Big Red Monster!

childDownloads.title: "Macho Man" Randy Savage Outfit
childDownloads.description: OOOOH YEEAAAH!  Step into “Macho Man” Randy Savage’s WrestleMania 3 Gear and let the madness run wild!

childDownloads.title: n.W.o Pack
childDownloads.description: If you own the WWE 2K14 Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. WWE 2K14 required; sold separately. Xbox LIVE free membership required. The following message has been paid for by the nWo. Everybody knows that when you’re nWo, you're nWo 4 life! Download this pack to play as the New World Order! Includes Scott Steiner, Curt Hennig, and Syxx, along with nWo characters for Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, and “Macho Man” Randy Savage. Note: This item is included in the Season Pass premium content purchase.

childDownloads.title: Online Pass
childDownloads.description: Online Pass is available with redemption of a single-use code found on the back of the manual included with your original retail purchase. If the Online Pass code has already been redeemed by a previous user, you can purchase Online Pass or begin a free limited trial. Online Pass includes multiplayer on Xbox Live and WWE Community Creations. Visit wwe.2k.com for more details.

childDownloads.title: Ultimate Warrior Trailer
childDownloads.description: WWE Legend Ultimate Warrior storms the 2K offices to announce himself as the exclusive pre-order bonus for WWE 2K14. Available October 29, 2013.

childDownloads.title: Become Immortal Trailer
childDownloads.description: Become Immortal with WWE 2K14, featuring current WWE Superstars and your favorite WWE Legends! Available on October 29, 2013.

childDownloads.title: Ric Flair Outfit
childDownloads.description: WOOOOOO!  Become the stylin’, profilin’, limousine riding, jet flying, kiss-stealing, wheelin’ n’ dealin’ son of a gun!  Download Ric Flair’s WrestleMania 8 Gear and prove to be the man, you’ve gotta beat the man!

childDownloads.title: Summer Rae
childDownloads.description: Her ravishing dance moves with dance partner Fandango have showed off her beauty and brains. Now, get in the ring and compete with the devious Diva, Summer Rae!

childDownloads.title: The Giant
childDownloads.description: Before he was the Big Show, he was the muscle behind the “nWo”! Download to play as The Giant’s “nWo” character!

childDownloads.title: The Rock Outfit
childDownloads.description: If you smellllllll what The Rock… is…cooking!  Download The People’s gear for your Avatar and Just Bring It!

childDownloads.title: The Rock Outfit
childDownloads.description: If you smellllllll what The Rock… is…cooking!  Download The People’s gear for your Avatar and Just Bring It!

childDownloads.title: Ultimate Warrior
childDownloads.description: Load the spaceship up with rocket fuel and play as the Ullllllltimate Warrior for the first time ever in franchise history!

childDownloads.title: Undertaker Outfit
childDownloads.description: Adorn your Avatar with “The Deadman’s” WrestleMania 12 Gear and tell your opponents to Rest…In…Peace!

childDownloads.title: Virgil
childDownloads.description: Fans have demanded it, and now your trusty sidekick is finally here! Play as the former Million Dollar Champion Virgil, and prove that not everyone has a price!

childDownloads.title: WWE 2K14 Season Pass
childDownloads.description: Season Pass is a discounted pre-payment for all four WWE 2K14 Add-On Packs – save over 25%! Season Pass also includes exclusive Kevin Nash “The Outsiders” and Scott Hall “The Outsiders” Characters. All Season Pass content will be available by February 2014. If you purchase Season Pass, please download the content in game to avoid being charged twice. Xbox Live Free Membership required. Does not include Online Pass, Undertaker exclusive character, or Ultimate Warrior. Visit wwe.2k.com for more details.

childDownloads.title: WWE Championship Title
childDownloads.description: The most coveted title in all of sports entertainment has arrived!  Download the new WWE Championship Title Avatar item!

childDownloads.title: WWE Legends and Creation Pack
childDownloads.description: If you own the WWE 2K14 Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. WWE 2K14 required; sold separately. Xbox LIVE free membership required. Some defined WrestleMania. Others defined sports entertainment itself. This pack includes the Living Legend Bruno Sammartino, WWE Legends Jake “The Snake” Roberts, “Ravishing” Rick Rude, and “The American Dream” Dusty Rhodes! Also included, the all-new Customization pack allows for more creative freedom than ever!

childDownloads.title: WWE Superstars and Moves Pack
childDownloads.description: If you own the WWE 2K14 Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. WWE 2K14 required; sold separately. Xbox LIVE free membership required. Download this pack for all-new WWE Superstars and Divas including Fandango, Big E Langston, and the sizzling hot Bella Twins! Also includes over 30 all-new moves and taunts, featuring AJ Lee’s Black Widow, and CM Punk’s Koji Clutch!
